snippet.title: Early Access Gameplay Trailer Relic Odyssey: Ruins of Xantao
snippet.description:
An adrenaline-fueled journey through the treacherous world of Relic Odyssey: Ruins of Xantao! Join Samuel, Sarah, and Clunky as they navigate the hostile planet of Valtar, battling alien creatures, ruthless smugglers, and the sinister "Collector" in a race to uncover the ancient power hidden within the ruins.

 With a mix of hand-crafted and procedurally generated environments, unique gameplay mechanics like digging rigs and powered gloves, and a gripping storyline, prepare to experience a sci-fi FPS adventure like never before!

Planned full release date: Q2 2024 (May)
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2297960/Relic_Odyssey__Ruins_Of_Xantao/

Discord community: https://discord.gg/wtXvWhewaM

#gameplay #games #game #gamingcommunity #relicodyssey #shooter
